# Conventional Commits Guide

## Format
<type>(<scope>): <description>

## Types
- feat: New feature
- fix: Bug fix
- docs: Documentation changes
- test: Adding or updating tests
- refactor: Code refactoring without functional changes
- style: Formatting changes (no logic)
- chore: Maintenance tasks, dependency updates
- perf: Performance improvements
- ci: Continuous integration changes

## Examples
feat(auth): implement login with JWT
fix(customer): correct NPE when document is null
docs(api): update swagger documentation
test(order): add unit tests for order calculation
refactor(common): extract helper class for validation
chore(deps): update gradle version
